com.model

Class HardwareDetails

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.model.HardwareDetails

  • public class HardwareDetails
extends java.lang.Object
    this class is used to use the hardware product details from the hardware details table
    Author:
    Administrator

      • HardwareDetails

        public HardwareDetails()
        simple constructor of super() type

      • HardwareDetails

        public HardwareDetails(int hardwareSrNo,
                       int hardwarePrice,
                       int hardwareQuantity,
                       int hardwareDiscount,
                       Hardware hardware,
                       java.lang.String hardwareName,
                       java.lang.String hardwareManufacture,
                       java.lang.String color)
        Parameterized Constructor
        Parameters:
        hardwareSrNo - is the primary serial no. given to all the hardware products
        hardwarePrice - is used to give the hardware price
        hardwareQuantity - is used to give the hardware quantity
        hardwareDiscount - is used to give the hardware discount
        hardware - is the object of the hardware type table which is used to get the hardware id and its category
        hardwareName - is used to get the hardware name
        hardwareManufacture - is used to get the hardware manufacturing company
        color - is used to give the color of the product
